SEND_FEEDBACK_TITLE.description: Option in the Help Menu to send a feedback

SEND_FEEDBACK_MESSAGE.description: Label of the input text area of the feedback

SEND_FEEDBACK_SEND.description: Button used to send the feecback

FEEDBACK_SCREENSHOT_ERROR.message: A apărut o eroare la capturarea paginii! Vă rugăm să încercați din nou!
FEEDBACK_SCREENSHOT_ERROR.description: Notification that shows up when  the system can't take a screenshot

SEND_FEEDBACK_CANCEL.description: Button to close the feedback dialog
